channel.title: Portals naming
channel.description: On my server, I have home obviously. I have these 4 portals. Each of them Teleporting you to Differn't monsters. And when you Examine the portal it says "A Portal From this Mystical Place" I was wondering, How do i change it to What monster is in the portal area so people know what they are going to,

item.title: Portals naming
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Go into one of the class files in your client and look for “a portal from this mystical place”

Read full topic

item.title: Portals naming
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_74 Hunter_74
item.description:
@Hunter_74 wrote:

On my server, I have home obviously.
I have these 4 portals.
Each of them Teleporting you to Differn’t monsters.
And when you Examine the portal it says
“A Portal From this Mystical Place”
I was wondering, How do i change it to What monster is in the portal area so people know what they are going to,

Read full topic
